participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Lena loves to explore new cultures and meet new people. She is optimistic and has a passion for baking.
participant_1.background: I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved. My mother is a librarian. I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life. I speak fluent German. I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, Jake enjoys sharing his culinary skills and is always eager to learn new things. He has a laid-back attitude and appreciates the little joys in life.
participant_2.background: I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers. Wedding cakes are my specialty. My panda mug is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of my favorite animal. I am the oldest of three boys. I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.

content.text: Hey! I'm interested in learning more about The Lumineers. What are some of your favorite songs by them?
I love all their songs but my favorite is probably "Ho Hey". It's so catchy and upbeat.
I love that song too! It's one of my go-to songs when I'm feeling down.
Me too! It always puts me in a good mood.
What else do you like to do?
I love to bake! I'm especially good at making wedding cakes.
That's awesome! I love baking too. I'm not very good at it, but it's so much fun.
I'm sure you're better than you think.
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies. They're so easy and delicious.
Yum! I love chocolate chip cookies too.
What else do you like to do?
I love to travel. I've been to a few different countries and I love experiencing new cultures.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to travel but I haven't had the chance yet.
You should definitely go! It's so much fun.
I know, I know! I'm going to plan a trip soon.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
